unnormalised: Right, people, buckle up! It's gossip time, hotter than a plate of Hyderabadi biryani in the peak of summer! And this week, the Bollywood masala is EXTRA spicy.
normalised: Right, people, buckle up! It's gossip time, hotter than a plate of Hyderabadi biryani in the peak of summer! And this week, the Bollywood masala is extra spicy.

unnormalised: First off, whispers are flying faster than a Delhi auto-rickshaw that superstar Rohan "Rocky" Khanna was spotted at a Mumbai nightclub looking suspiciously cozy with… wait for it… fashion guru, Priya Sharma! Remember, Rocky’s been “happily married” (allegedly) to actress Deepika Rao for, like, five years. Five years is practically an eternity in Bollywood terms. Deepika, bless her heart, was reportedly busy promoting her latest film in Kerala, probably enjoying some peaceful Onam celebrations and completely oblivious to Rocky’s *ahem* "networking."
normalised: First off, whispers are flying faster than a Delhi auto-rickshaw that superstar Rohan "Rocky" Khanna was spotted at a Mumbai nightclub looking suspiciously cozy with… wait for it… fashion guru, Priya Sharma! Remember, Rocky’s been “happily married” (allegedly) to actress Deepika Rao for, like, five years. Five years is practically an eternity in Bollywood terms. Deepika, bless her heart, was reportedly busy promoting her latest film in Kerala, probably enjoying some peaceful Onam celebrations and completely oblivious to Rocky’s ahem "networking."

unnormalised: Sources (aka a guy who claims to know a bartender at said nightclub) say they were “laughing… touching arms… you know, the usual.” The “usual” meaning blatant flirting in plain sight. Is this the end of the Rocky-Deepika dynasty? Only time (and Page 3) will tell.
normalised: Sources (aka a guy who claims to know a bartender at said nightclub) say they were “laughing… touching arms… you know, the usual.” The “usual” meaning blatant flirting in plain sight. Is this the end of the Rocky-Deepika dynasty? Only time (and Page three) will tell.

unnormalised: Next up, rumor has it that comedian Anjali Patel accidentally wore the same Manish Malhotra lehenga as socialite Mrs. Verma to a recent charity gala. The absolute HORROR! Apparently, Mrs. Verma gave Anjali the kind of withering look that could curdle milk at 50 km. We're talking DEFCON 1 levels of saree drama, folks! Anjali, ever the professional, just cracked a joke about it ("Guess we both have excellent taste!"), but insiders say she was seething internally.
normalised: Next up, rumor has it that comedian Anjali Patel accidentally wore the same Manish Malhotra lehenga as socialite Missus Verma to a recent charity gala. The absolute horror! Apparently, Missus Verma gave Anjali the kind of withering look that could curdle milk at fifty kilometer. We're talking D E F C O N one levels of saree drama, folks! Anjali, ever the professional, just cracked a joke about it ("Guess we both have excellent taste!"), but insiders say she was seething internally.

unnormalised: And finally, our beloved cricketing hero, Virat Singh, was apparently seen arguing loudly with his… agent?… at a Delhi chai stall. The topic? Speculation is rife. Was it about his endorsements? His batting average? The scandalous rumour about his secret love of pineapple on pizza? (Okay, I made that last one up, but can you imagine?). Whatever it was, the chai wallah definitely got an earful – and probably sold a record number of samosas thanks to the crowd that gathered. Stay tuned for more juicy details next week! Don't forget to like and share!
